name: Heather Markel
what_you_do: Heather Markel is a full-time traveler and travel expert who helps people over 40 reinvent their lives through global living, remote income, and a clear step-by-step plan for long-term travel.
who_you_serve: People over 40 who want to reinvent their lives through full-time travel and living abroad.
social_proof: Heather's work has been featured in The New York Times, USA Today, BBC Travel, and Entrepreneur.
signature_programs: Full-Time Travel Academy, How to Afford the Travel Life Action Guide, How to Make Money Without a Job Course
niche: full-time travel, global living, life reinvention
business_focus: Helping people over 40 redesign their lives through global living, income flexibility, and financial clarity.
service_provided: Travel coaching, online courses, ebooks, blog content
